title: NBA Team Stats Visualization
text:
1 Introduction
We chose this topic because we were both engaged in basketball as a kid. Discussions about favorite basketball teams and players always circle around NBA, about who is the best NBA basketball player or which team is the best basketball team. We also want to do statistical analysis and visualization of the play stlyes of different teams, and analyze what feature likely tell us that a team or player is considered good or better.
In case if you never played basketball or never watched NBA, NBA stands for National Basketball Association, it has 30 teams in total. 29 of the NBA teams are from USA and one team from Canada. The 30 teams are then divided into two different conferences. What we will look at is the data for the regular season, which starts in October and ends in mid-April. There will be 82 games in total. Teams will be ranked by their performance and only the top ranking teams are allowed to enter playoffs.

title: 2  Data
text:
2.2 Missing value analysis
There is no missing value in both data as the following two graphs show.


Code
library(naniar)
players_data_2023_2024 <- read.csv("data/NBA_players_2023-2024csv.csv")
vis_miss(players_data_2023_2024)









It shows there is no missing value in the data of NBA players.


Code
library(naniar)
team_data_2023_2024 <- read.csv("data/NBA_team_2023-2024csv.csv")
vis_miss(team_data_2023_2024)









It shows there is no missing value in the data of NBA teams.

title: 2  Data
text:
2.1 Description
The data we use is provided from National Basketball Association (NBA). All the data is from NBA official, and the data is publicly available and can be accessed at the following URL: https://www.nba.com/stats. From the website, we mainly use the basic stats of every NBA teams and every NBA plyers.
The data of NBA teams have attributes like the number of wins and losses games in this season, average scores per game, average minutes played per game, and son on. It has 26 attributes and there are total 30 teams. The data of NBA players have about 500 players and 26 attributes like number of wins and losses games in this season, average scores per game, and so on. The attributes of two data are the same.
The data is update daily in the current seasons and the data of previous season will not be updated. Since the data is publicly available, we directly copy the stats from the website. The precise links of two data are https://www.nba.com/stats/players/traditional?Season=2023-24 and https://www.nba.com/stats/teams/traditional?Season=2023-24.
